name: War Stories
description:
War Stories is a game about a soldier in the start of a war.

27/02/2017 - Translated to English.

** SPOILER ALERT!! **
If you want to play the neon level you must click a few times the led light in the option menu.
If you want to play the zombie level you must click a few times the zombie. You can see the zombie from the level selector.

Enjoy the game!
